item.description:
This class uses isolations to build lean strong muscles throughout the body. We use a chair , a body ball, free weights, and resistance bands to help balance and use our own body weight to build muscles you may have forgot about. You will leave this class knowing and feeling like you got an unbelievable workout. It improves posture , builds lean muscle, and burns calories all at once. If you've always wanted a ballerina body give it try.

Please wear comfortable clothes and sneakers. Individual classes are $10 each and ten-packs are $90 (and can be used on any adult classes at the studio).

*Interested participants must register at www.bridgetsdancestudio.com at least 24 hours in advance*

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Trim & Tone
